mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from module
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select m.* from module m where m.status = 1;

SELECT DISTINCT DISTINCT m.* FROM module m, user u, role r, user_role ur, role_module rm WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND ur.`user_id` = u.`user_id` AND ur.`role_id` = r.`id` AND rm.`role_id` = r.`id` AND rm.`module_id` = m.`id`;
SELECT module_name FROM module WHERE module_name LIKE #{fuzzyText};
